81948.「アタシ 古代のマシンに ふれるのが\n 三度のメシより 好きなんだけど\n な:
I love working on ancient machines more than anything else, but I wonder if there's a way I can make a living doing it?
I don't have the know-how to fix a broken machine, but I am good with my hands... I wonder if that could be useful somehow?

87177.「<%sL_PRISM>に\n フォルムチェンジするんだね？\n<yesno><:
You wanna change the form to
<%sL_PRISM>?
<yesno><close>

87178.「それだと 今と変わらないよ？\n 他のものを 選んでおくれ。\n<end>:
You don't wanna change? Then please choose
something else.
<end>

87179.「いらっしゃい！\n ここは ドルボードのカスタム屋だよ！\n さあ！ 今日は:
Welcome, welcome! This here is a Dolboard
Customize Shop. Now, how can I help you
today?
<break>

87180.「ドルボードの フォルムは\n 『さくせん』の『いろいろ設定』の中にある\n 『:
You can change your Dolboard's form any time
by using "Settings" under "Misc.", then
"Dolboard Settings".
<b>
If you find any new prisms, please bring them
to me! May you have great times with your
Dolboard!

87181.ドルボードは\n<%sL_PRISM> のフォルムとなった！:
Your Dolboard has changed forms to
<%sL_PRISM>!

87183.「いらっしゃい！\n ここは ドルボードのカスタム屋だよ！\n<end>:
Welcome, welcome! This is a Dolboard Customize
Shop!
<end>

87184.「そ……それは\n <%sL_PRISM> じゃないか！\n アンタ すごいもの:
Th...that's a <%sL_PRISM>, isn't it?! You have something pretty great right there!
If you attach this to your Dolboard, you can change its appearance!
Of course, you can change its form back at any time, and forms don't affect its speed or performance!
So then, why not try installing <%sL_PRISM> onto your Dolboard?

87185.「あら残念。ロマンが無いねぇ。\n また気が向いたら その時は よろしく頼むよ！:
That's too bad... no love at all... well,
if you change your mind, I could really use
your help!

87186.「フフフフフフフフフフフフフフフ。\n ついに……ついに！ この時が来たよ！\n:
Fufufufufufu...at last, at last! The time has
come! LET'S PRISM CUSTOMIIIIIIIZE!!
<end>

87187.<%sL_PRISM>が 取り付けられ\nドルボードのフォルムが ひとつ増えた！:
<%sL_PRISM> has been installed,
adding an additional Dolboard form!<me_71><end>

87188.「さて それじゃあ\n ここからが カスタム屋の本業だよ。\n<br>\n「さあ:
So, that's where the Customize Shop comes in.
Now then! How can I help you today?

87189.「アタシ 特技を活かして\n ドルボードっていう 古代の乗り物を改造する\n カ:
I've decided to use my skills to start a Customize Shop that modifies ancient vehicles called Dolboards.
If you brought me a Dolboard, I could change its shape, its color... it's quite the romantic job.
Ahh! Isn't there anyone out there as romantic as me that would let me tinker with a Dolboard?
By the way, I think I heard that scholar next to me mention something about it...

87190.「何についての 説明が聞きたいんだい？\n<select_se_off>\nカラ:
What would you like me to explain?
<select_se_off>
About Coloring
About Changing Forms
<select_end><break>

87282.「アタシ 特技を活かして\n ドルボードっていう 古代の乗り物を改造する\n カ:
I've decided to use my skills to start a
Customizing Shop, modifying ancient vehicles
called Dolboards.<end>

88321.「さあ！ 今日は なんの用だい？\n<break>: Now then! What can I do for you today?<break>

88322.「ということで さて\n ここは ドルボードのカスタム屋だよ！\n さあ！ 今日:
So, now, this is a custom dollar board shop!
Come on! What can I do for you today?<break>

93440.「<%sL_PRISM>の\n <%sL_SLOT>の部分を\n <%sL_C_:
So you want to color the <%sL_SLOT> part of
<%sL_PRISM> to <%sL_C_COLOR>? Then you'll
need 10 <%sL_ITEM> and <%nL_GOLD> gold, okay?<yesno><break>

93441.「元の色に戻すには <%nL_GOLD>ゴールドかかるけど\n いいかい？\n<:
It'll cost you <%nL_GOLD> gold to get it back
to its original color, okay?<yesno><break>

93442.「やめるんだね。\n それなら 他の色を 選んでおくれ。: I don't want to... Then pick another color...

93444.「……よし！ きれいに できたよ！\n<br>\n「他にも カラーリングしたい部:
... Yes! That was beautiful! Is there
anything else you'd like to color?

93445.「オッケー！ じゃあ色を戻すよ！: Okay! Then I'll turn the color back on!

93446.「……よし！ 元の色に戻ったよ！\n<br>\n「他にも カラーリングしたい部分:
... Okay! I'm back to my original color! Is
there anything else you'd like to color?

93447.「おや？ 素材が足りないようだよ。: Hmm? You're missing a few ingredients...

93448.「おや？ お金が足りないようだよ。: Hmm? You don't have enough money...

93449.「それだと 今の色と変わらないよ？\n 他の色を 選んでおくれ。:
It's the same color as the one we have now,
okay? We'll pick another color...

93450.「カラーリングは\n アンタのマシンの フォルムを\n 様々な色に 変更できるサ:
Livery is a service that allows you to change the form of your machine to a variety of colors. To color your machine, you'll need
materials for the coloring process. To restore the original color, you need nothing...

93451.「フォルムチェンジは\n アンタのマシンの フォルムを\n 好きなものに 変更で:
A form change is a service that allows you to change the shape of your machine to whatever you want! You'll need to have at least one of
these priceless prisms attached to your dollar board to get a form change. As for the fee for the change of form, it's my hobby,
and I don't...

93795.「おっと すまないね。\n 今のアンタの マシン状態だと\n まだフォルムチェン:
Oh, sorry... With your current machine, you can't form-change yet... To do that, you need a prism, a very valuable item... If you've
got a Prism somewhere, bring it to me! Then I'll install the prism into your machine for you!

93796.「もしも どこかで プリズムっていう\n 貴重品を 手に入れたなら\n アタシの:
If you happen to have a prism, a priceless item, somewhere, bring it to me. And I'll install it in your machine for you...
Goodbye. There's a romance in your machine...

94164.ドルボードのフォルムを\n元のフォルムに 戻した！:
I've restored the form of the dollar board to
its original form!

114819.「ドルボードの ＢＧＭは\n 『さくせん』の『いろいろ設定』の中にある\n 『ド:
You can change the background music for the dollar board in the "Dollar Board Settings" section of the "Strategy" menu... I'll see
you when I get a new dolphin goal... Goodbye! There's romance in your machine...

114820.「そ……それは\n <%sL_DRGR> じゃないか！\n アンタ 素敵なものを:
Th...that's a <%sL_DRGR>, isn't it?! You have something pretty great right there!
If you attach this to your Dolboard, you can change the background music that plays while riding it!
Of course, you can change the music back at any time, and the music doesn't affect its speed or performance!
So then, why not try installing that <%sL_PRISM> onto your Dolboard?

114821.「フフフフフフフフフフフフフフフ。\n ロマンチックに 決めるよ！\n レッツ:
Fufufufufufu... I'll give it a lovely touch!
LET'S PRISM CUSTOMIIIIIIIZE!!
<end>

114822.<%sL_DRGR>が 取り付けられ\nドルボードのＢＧＭが ひとつ増えた！\n:
<%sL_DRGR> has been installed,
adding an additional BGM option to your
Dolboard!
<me_71><end>

114823.「ドルボードの フォルムは\n 『さくせん』の『いろいろ設定』の中にある\n 『:
You can change your Dolboard's form with "Dolboard Settings" by choosing "Misc." and then "Settings".
You can also use this setting to change your Dolboard's BGM when you ride it.
If you find any new prisms or Dol Radios, bring them to me. Now then! May you have great times with your Dolboard!

264267.「必要な素材を 確かめておくれ。\n この内容で カラーリングするんだね？\n<:
Let's see what we need... This is what you're
going to color?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

264269.「それだと 今の色と変わらないよ？: That's the same color as it is now, okay?

264271.「おや？ 素材が足りないようだよ。: Hmm? You're missing a few ingredients...

264272.「セットした色を 元に戻すのかい？\n<yesno><close>: You want me to undo the colors I set?<yesno><close>

264273.このカラーリングに 必要な素材を\nコミュニケーションウィンドウの システムログ:
Do you want the materials required for this
livery to be written to the system log in the
communication window?<yesno><close>

264280.「カラフルブーケの 割り当てを\n キャンセルして 戻るのかい？\n<yesno:
You're going back to cancel the Colorful
Bouquet assignment?<yesno><close>

264282.「必要な素材に 染色用の花がないと\n カラフルブーケが 使えないよ。:
If you don't have the necessary materials,
flowers for dyeing, you can't use the
colorful bouquet.

264283.「必要な素材を 確かめておくれ。\n 期限付きの場合は 期限が近いものを使うよ。:
Make sure you have what you need. If there's an expiration date, we'll need to find one closer to that date. This is what you're
going to color?

264284.「すまないが これは\n 妖精の姿見を 持っていないとできないよ。:
I'm sorry, but this is only possible if you
have a fairy vision...

264285.「妖精の姿見に記録してある\n カラーを 反映させるのかい？ \n<yesno>:
You want the fairy's vision to reflect the
colors you've recorded?<yesno><close>

264356.「すまないけど そのカラー部位は\n カラーリングできないよ。:
I'm sorry, but you can't color that part of
the...

264357.「カラーリングだね。\n そういえば カラーリングの方法が\n リニューアルされ:
Colorin... Oh, by the way, the way you color your hair has been revamped. We used to color one color at a time, but now you can choose
the color you want to change first, and then we'll color it all at once. We've also started a new service where you can use
colorful bouquets instead of coloring materials... Colorful Bouquets can be found in the DQX Shop, so if you've got one, bring
it to me...

268227.「すまないが これは\n カラフルブーケを 持っていないとできないよ。:
I'm sorry, but this is only possible if you
have a colorful bouquet...
